original_text: And the Levites carried the ark of God with the poles on their shoulders, as Moses had commanded in accordance with the word of the Lord.
korean_text: 모세가 여호와의 말씀을 따라 명령한 대로 레위 자손이 채에 하나님의 궤를 꿰어 어깨에 메니라

sentences.original_text: And the Levites carried the ark of God
with the poles on their shoulders
in accordance with the word of the Lord
